text: Archduke Charles of Austria (1771-1847) was one of the Austrian Empire's dukes. He fought in the Napoleonic Wars. The Austrian Empire ruled places the places that we call Hungary, Croatia, Austria, Czechia, Slovakia, Bosnia, Leichtenstein, Slovenia, Serbia, Montenegro, and Albania today. ==References== Category:Austrian nobility Category:Dukes and duchesses Category:1771 births Category:1847 deaths
title: Archduke Charles, Duke of Teschen
